participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

trial_type.Description: A type of trial condition presented to the participant.

Levels.Go: Stimulus NOT followed by a stop signal.
Levels.Stop: Stimulus followed by a stop signal.

stop_signal_delay.Description: Time between stimulus presentation and auditory stop signal presentation.

go_reaction_time.Description: Time taken by the participant to respond to the stimulus.

correct_go.Description: Did the participant respond correctly to the stimulus regardless whether it was followed by an auditory stop signal?

Levels.1: Yes, participant responded correctly to the stimulus.
Levels.0: No, participant responded incorrectly to the stimulus.

successful_stop.Description: Did the participant successfully inhibit their response to stimulus after being presented with an auditory stop signal?

Levels.1: Yes, participant successfully inhibited their response.
Levels.0: No, participant failed to inhibit their response.
